name: VOOT Group Extension
description: Defining some additional attributes for groups within VOOT.

attributes.name: groupType
attributes.description: Type of group. Studieretning, kull, emne, more...

attributes.name: sourceID
attributes.description: An indentifier representing the authorative source of this group definition.

attributes.name: notBefore
attributes.description: The group is not active (valid) before this date.

attributes.name: notAfter
attributes.description: The group is not active (valid) after this date.

attributes.name: groupActive
attributes.description: Default is true. If the group is set to passive, it means that the group is not currently valid.
